name: boots
description: Where it all began, six decades ago. We've made more boots than any other style. From our Original 1460 to sky-high 20-eye editions and hard-hitting platforms, discover the full range of DM's boots below.

name: shoes
description: Docs shoes started out as a worker's shoe. And since then, Dr. Martens footwear has since been adopted, shaped and subverted by countless subcultures and individuals.

name: sandals
description: Stomp your way through summer in a pair of Docs sandals. Lighter but just as tough as our shoes and boots, our sandals can take whatever the warmer seasons throw at them.

name: platforms
description: Docs have reached new heights. With towering double-height soles, our empowering platform boots and shoes are stacked high with Docs DNA. Our range includes standout leather platforms as well as 100% vegan alternatives.
